section.title: Introduction
section.para: This document provides a per-release list of enhancements and changes to the dblatex project. dumps the entire change log, since it may contain details omitted in the release sections, like the precise list of the bugs fixed.
For releases prior or equal to version 0.2.9 the changes were listed in the dblatex manual. The full change history is now stored in this release note.

section.title: Release 0.3.9
section.para: This is a minor release with some new features.

section.title: Release 0.3.8
section.para: This release fixes some bugs and contains some new features.

section.title: Release 0.3.7
section.para: This is a bug fix release with some minor improvements.

section.title: Release 0.3.6
section.para: This is a bug fix release with some minor improvements.

section.title: Release 0.3.5
section.para: This is a bug fix release.

section.title: Release 0.3.4
section.para: This release contains completed features sponsored by Freexian that were not ready in the previous version.

section.title: Release 0.3.3
section.para: Thanks to Freexian that is the sponsor of this release. It contains a number of new features.

section.title: Release 0.3.2
section.para: Some new features or improvements.

section.title: Release 0.3.1
section.para: Mainly a bug fix release.

section.para: Bug fix release.

appendix.title: Change Log
appendix.para: The listing below contains all the raw data used to write each release change section. It is provided since it may contain additional details.
